title: Gravity - increase force exerted by shell

content.question: A large spherical shell with a uniform mass distribution contains a small object within the thickness of the shell, as shown in the figure. At which of the following locations could the object be moved to increase the magnitude of the gravitational force exerted on the object by the shell?

choices.label: At the center of the shell
Between the center of the shell and the shell’s inner surface
Between the shell’s inner surface and the object’s original location
Between the object’s original location and the shell’s outer surface

content.answer: Between the object’s original location and the shell’s outer surface

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
